metadata.title: SLHKPNS Purple Owls Kitchen Hanging Hand Towels, Cartoon Art Absorbent Tie Towel with Loop 2 PCS Kitchen Linen Sets for Bathroom Restroom Home Decor, Purple Owl, 14x18in
features: 1.MATERIAL:Made with fast dry coral fleece fabric (100% polyester),which can soaks up water and absorption spill.It's super soft,thirsty and not easy to leave lint.Suitable for cuisine shower hand towel,dish wipe,car wash,table wipe.

3.EASY TO STORAGE:It has a loop fasteners and a reinforced hang tab,can be easy hung anywhere around your home for quick-access use and keeps towels from sliding off onto the floor,so that does not occupy a place and health.

4.MULTIUSE:These towels are practical throughout your home-keep one in the kitchen hanging on your oven or refrigerator,add one outside on the grill while you cook,so it is convenient for you to use it anytime.these towels are versatile and useful for many functions.The unique print towel can match or coordinate with your existing home decor.Also drying,wiping and cleaning pots,dishes,plates or glasses.
5.Perfect gift for parents,friends,lovers on birthday,Valentine's day,St.Patrick's day,Mother's Day,Halloween,Memorial Day,Thanksgiving,Christmas,Independence Day,Easter,Housewarming gift.
description: FEATURES: 1.Ultra absorbent,fast Drying; 2.Loop fasteners Design saves space; 3.Perfect hand towels for kitchen,bathroom,children's room,wash room; 4.Durable and machine washable; 5.Help you to reduce your annoyance of water drops in floor and waste of paper towels; they are eco-friendly to reduce paper towels waste; 6.Fresh-looking with fun colors, you are sure to find one to match your decor. SPECIFICATION: (1)Material: soft coral velvet(100% polyester); (2)Size:14x18.2in(35.5x46.2cm),set of 2; (3)Weight:3.53OZ; (4)Printing:Single side printing; (5)Packing includes:2*Hanging Hand Towels. NOTE: (1)This product is not suitable for scalding at a high temperature above 40 degrees.The fiber towel has a white bottom.Do not wring dry after washing,and smooth in the direction of the wool to maintain the original pattern. (2)Please allow little color difference due to different camera or different screen display. (3)Due to different measurement methods,please allow 0.5-2 inch error, the error range is not a quality problem. CARE INSTRUCTION: Washed by machine and wash in warm water less than 40 degrees; Do not use bleach and other detergents.

title: WCGXKO Owl Lover Gift Owl Kitchen Decor Housewarming Gift
